title: Australian financial regulator imposes additional conditions on IOOF unit
text:
Australian financial regulator imposes additional conditions on IOOF unit

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Oct 28, 2019 09:35)

© Reuters. Australian financial regulator imposes additional conditions on IOOF unit Oct 28 (Reuters) - Australia's financial regulator said on Monday it has imposed additional licence conditions on the investment services unit of wealth manager IOOF Holdings Ltd . The Australian Securities and Investments Commission (ASIC)said the extra conditions IOOF Investment Services Ltd related to governance, structure and compliance arrangements. The changes were part of a broader restructure of the IOOF group, ASIC said.

Australian financial regulator imposes additional conditions on IOOF unit
description: Australian financial regulator imposes additional conditions on IOOF unit
